description: Culturally, typologically or otherwise defined archaeological period
Period defined by historical rather than archaeological records
Temporal period as defined by pollen stratigraphy
Oxygen Isotope Stage, Marine isotope stages (MIS), marine oxygen-isotope stages. Periods defined by analysis of (mainly) oxygen isotopes in marine cores.
Subdivision of geological time period which is divided into epochs.
General geological age. Either crosses established temporal type definitions, or may need correctly assigning.
Age type either undefined or questioned
Absolute date in calendar years (single year)
Absolute date range in calendar years (range of years)
